meanings.sent1: The children at the playground were hyperenergetic, running around and laughing.
meanings.sent2: She is always hyperenergetic, ready to tackle any challenge with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The hyperenergetic puppy chased its tail in circles, never getting tired.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperenergetic personality is like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The hyperenergetic dance performance left the audience in awe of their energy.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive energy and activity
meanings.sent1: The hyperenergetic squirrel darted from tree to tree, never staying still.
meanings.sent2: The hyperenergetic puppy was always getting into mischief with its boundless energy.
meanings.sent3: The hyperenergetic alarm clock seemed to have a mind of its own, ringing at odd hours.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperenergetic mind raced with ideas, never slowing down to rest.
meanings.sent5: The hyperenergetic crowd at the concert jumped and danced with infectious energy.
